entry.source: When I was defeated by the dragon{F801}{F804,5}{F873,1},{F804,0} it stole my heart and eyes. Letting{F801}{F873,1} rule would fill the world with{F801}violent storms, but I don't stand a chance{F801}against him now. Is there anyone who can best{F801}him? He should be wandering in {F804,5}Akasaka.{F804,0}{F801}
